summary: Added Dependencies field to plan format standards in both plan-format.md and artifact-formats.md. The notation (None | Phase {N} | Phase {N}, Phase {M}) enables explicit DAG representation for parallel execution. Field is optional for backward compatibility.

artifacts.summary: Added Dependencies field specification with full notation syntax, examples, and backward compatibility documentation
Added Dependencies field to Implementation Plans phase template

completion_data.completion_summary: Added Dependencies field to plan-format.md and artifact-formats.md with notation: None | Phase {N} | Phase {N}, Phase {M}. Enables explicit DAG representation for parallel phase execution.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Updated plan-format.md (added Phase Dependencies Notation section with syntax and examples), updated artifact-formats.md (added Dependencies field to phase template)
